Package duke.ui

Class Ui

  • java.lang.Object
    • duke.ui.Ui
  • public class Ui
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the user interface of the Duke program. The Duke program will print information here. The user interface can display the change information, error messages, exit message, list of task, welcome message to the user.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Ui()
      Constructs a new user interface to display information.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.lang.String readCommand()
      Reads the command entered by the user.
      void showAddInformation​(java.lang.String task, int size)
      Prints a message that informs the user that a task has been added into the list.
      void showDeletedMessage​(java.lang.String task, int size)
      Prints a message that informs the user that the task has been deleted.
      void showError​(java.lang.String message)
      Prints a error message for the user when an error has occurred.
      void showExitMessage()
      Prints a exit message for the user.
      void showLineError​(int lineCount, java.lang.String line)
      Prints a error message for the user with the constituent line number and the its content.
      void showLoadingError()
      Prints a loading error message for the user.
      void showMarkedAsDone​(java.lang.String task)
      Prints a message that informs the user that the task has been marked as done.
      void showTable​(java.lang.String list)
      Prints the current tasks in the list.
      void showWelcome()
      Prints a welcome message for the user.

    • Method Detail

      • showWelcome

        public void showWelcome()
        Prints a welcome message for the user.

      • showError

        public void showError​(java.lang.String message)
        Prints a error message for the user when an error has occurred.
        Parameters:
        message - the error message for the error

      • showLoadingError

        public void showLoadingError()
        Prints a loading error message for the user. This will occur when Duke is unable to load the file path specified in Duke. See Duke for more information.

      • showLineError

        public void showLineError​(int lineCount,
                          java.lang.String line)
        Prints a error message for the user with the constituent line number and the its content.
        Parameters:
        lineCount - the line number of the error
        line - the contents of the line itself

      • readCommand

        public java.lang.String readCommand()
        Reads the command entered by the user.
        Returns:
        Returns the command entered by the user

      • showTable

        public void showTable​(java.lang.String list)
        Prints the current tasks in the list.
        Parameters:
        list - the list of tasks to be printed

      • showAddInformation

        public void showAddInformation​(java.lang.String task,
                               int size)
        Prints a message that informs the user that a task has been added into the list.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be added into the list
        size - the number of tasks in the list

      • showMarkedAsDone

        public void showMarkedAsDone​(java.lang.String task)
        Prints a message that informs the user that the task has been marked as done.
        Parameters:
        task - the task that is marked done

      • showDeletedMessage

        public void showDeletedMessage​(java.lang.String task,
                               int size)
        Prints a message that informs the user that the task has been deleted.
        Parameters:
        task - the task that is deleted
        size - the number of tasks remaining in the list

      • showExitMessage

        public void showExitMessage()
        Prints a exit message for the user.
